preface.title: About this Guide
preface.para: This book is part of the official &obs; documentation. These books are considered to be reviewed and edited to be the reference documentation of &obsa;.

These books are not considered to be focused on a special &obsa; version. They are also not a replacment of the documentation inside of the openSUSE wiki. But content from the wiki may get consolidated and included in these books.

Furthermore these books get written by the &obsa; community, please check the chapter how to work on these books. We request esp. experienced users and administrators to join and to contribute to these books. It is not required to be a very good or even native english speaker, because we built on community editors to improve the language.
